# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configurations, please modify both of them.

# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only

# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.
#
# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.


set(
  ANTLR_PACKAGE_NAME
  NSQLGenerated
)

set(
  LEXER_PARSER_NAMESPACE
  NALP
)

set(
  PROTOBUF_HEADER_PATH
  ydb/library/yql/parser/proto_ast/gen/v0_proto_split
)

set(
  PROTOBUF_SUFFIX_PATH
  .pb.main.h
)

add_library(proto_ast-gen-v0)

target_compile_options(proto_ast-gen-v0 PRIVATE
  $<IF:$<CXX_COMPILER_ID:MSVC>,,-Wno-everything>
)

target_include_directories(proto_ast-gen-v0 PUBLIC
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/antlr4_cpp_runtime/src
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/parser/proto_ast/gen/v0/org/antlr/codegen/templates/Cpp
)

target_link_libraries(proto_ast-gen-v0 PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  proto_ast-gen-v0_proto_split
)

target_sources(proto_ast-gen-v0 PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/parser/proto_ast/gen/v0/org/antlr/codegen/templates/Cpp/Cpp.stg
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/parser/proto_ast/gen/v0/SQLParser.h
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/parser/proto_ast/gen/v0/SQLLexer.h
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/parser/proto_ast/gen/v0/SQLParser.cpp
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/parser/proto_ast/gen/v0/SQLLexer.cpp
)

configure_file(
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/parser/proto_ast/org/antlr/codegen/templates/Cpp/Cpp.stg.in
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/parser/proto_ast/gen/v0/org/antlr/codegen/templates/Cpp/Cpp.stg
)

run_antlr(
  OUTPUT
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/parser/proto_ast/gen/v0/SQLParser.cpp
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/parser/proto_ast/gen/v0/SQLLexer.cpp
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/parser/proto_ast/gen/v0/SQLParser.h
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/parser/proto_ast/gen/v0/SQLLexer.h
  DEPENDS
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/sql/v0/SQL.g
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/parser/proto_ast/gen/v0/org/antlr/codegen/templates/Cpp/Cpp.stg

  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/sql/v0/SQL.g
  -lib
  .
  -fo
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/parser/proto_ast/gen/v0
)

set(GRAMMAR_STRING_CORE_DOUBLE "~(QUOTE_DOUBLE | BACKSLASH) | (BACKSLASH .)")
